concept-wr.title: Overview of Titanium Server Planning
concept-wr.shortdesc: Fully planning your Titanium Server installation and configuration helps to expedite the process and ensure that you have everything required.

conbody.p: Planning also helps ensure that the requirements of your hosted applications can be met, and the requirements of your Cloud administration and operations team can be met. It also ensures proper integration of Titanium Server into the target Data Center or Telecom Office, and helps you plan up front for future cloud growth.
